outline:
1. possession, property, inheritance, heritage
    1. property
    2. portion, share
    3. inheritance, portion
kjv_def: heritage, to inherit, inheritance, possession. Compare H5158 (נַחַל).
strongs_def: properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
